name: Find Help Now KY
description: Find Help Now KY is a free online treatment locator service operated by the University of Kentucky that provides real-time access to Kentucky-based addiction treatment providers who are accepting clients. The service works with hundreds of mental health treatment, substance use disorder treatment, naloxone, and recovery housing organizations across Kentucky to provide up-to-date and accurate information about available openings. Users can search for mental health treatment, substance use disorder treatment, recovery housing, and naloxone distribution sites.
source: Verified from official website, multiple online directories, and government sources
hours_of_operation: Website available 24/7, KY HELP Call Center: Monday-Friday 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM, Saturday-Sunday 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM EST/EDT
eligibility: Kentucky residents seeking substance use disorder treatment, mental health treatment, recovery housing, or naloxone
cost_information: Free service to find treatment providers
notes: Operated by University of Kentucky in partnership with Kentucky Cabinet for Health and Family Services. Provides real-time treatment availability information and connects users with KY HELP Statewide Call Center for additional support.
